description: I. Letter dated 14/10/2008 from Stuart Hoggan, Director Communities Group, to local authorities regarding implementation of the Sustainable Communities Act 2007. 3 p. II. Letter dated 14/10/2008 from Hazel Blears MP to local authorities regarding the first invitation to submit proposals under the Sustainable Communities Act 2007. 2 p.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
